Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
â€¢ pectra-devnet-1 : waiting on execution layer clients
â€¢ EIP6110 validator deposits onchain : proposal to rate limit deposit
processing
â€¢ EIP7594 PeerDAS : peerdas-devnet-1 launched with 3 consensus layer
clients, discussion on decoupling layers for blob count
â€¢ EIP7688 SSZ StableContainer : devnet running but not all clients have
implemented, no decision yet on including in Electra
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
â€¢ Future of EOA/AA breakout #5 : EIP7702 delegation designation proposal
to be merged next week
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #2 : passing max blobs per block is preferred
solution for decoupling layers, value should be configurable and
fetching from execution layer pool experiment

~55% majority Lighthouse client info in graffiti (7.4% of blocks): Geth
62% Consensus layer: Prysm 38% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
